mapper.select: SELECT od.id oid, room_id, guest_id, check_in_time, check_out_time, real_pay, od.`group` gp, r.id rid, r.name rname, type_id, floor, `desc` rdesc, id_num, g.name gname, phone, sex, age FROM hotel.`order` od LEFT JOIN hotel.room r ON r.id = od.room_id LEFT JOIN hotel.guest g ON g.id_num = od.guest_id WHERE od.id = ${orderId};
